text: Ii nara lukɔndɔla laminin faaninilu ri, a ni samasen ni woilu siifenju, ka na faaninbon donda faanin fanan di. Faaninbon lukɔndɔla laminin faaninilu ri sidi bɔlɔ mɛnilu la duu ma, ii nara woilu fanan di, a ni ii juluilu. Ii nara fen bɛɛ ri, mɛnilu bilatɔ Alla daa makɛ faaninbon kɔndɔ, Alla Kunbɛn Diya Faaninbon kɔnin.
